title: Project Library Polling Initiative
short: Help us raise the funds needed to conduct comprehensive polling on our upcoming library funding ballot measure.
description: Libraries are at the heart of every community, but we need solid data to ensure voters understand the full impact of our proposed ballot initiative. Your contribution will underwrite a professional polling firm to survey voters across the county—identifying key messages, measuring support levels, and pinpointing potential concerns. With clear, actionable insights in hand, our campaign can tailor outreach to build the broadest coalition in favor of stable, long-term library funding.
